headline: Electric Vehicle (EV) Battery Cell and Pack Materials Report 2026-2035: A $38+ Billion Market by 2030 with Ford, BYD, Panasonic, SK Innovation,  Contemporary Amperex Technology, LG Chem Leading
summary: Key market opportunities in the EV battery cell and pack materials sector include solid-state battery commercialization, raw material diversification, and the adoption of advanced battery chemistries. Growing EV production, government incentives, and innovations like fast-charging solutions drive demand, while emphasis on recycling and localized supply chains offers further growth potential. headline: Ford recalling 4.3 million US vehicles over software issue

headline: Automaker Stellantis posts massive loss, pivots from EV
summary: Troubled automaker Stellantis, behind brands like Jeep and Fiat, announced Thursday a net loss of 22.3 billion euros ($26.3 billion) for last year, blaming a lack of demand for electric vehicles.Stellantis' revenue fell only by two percent to 153.5 billion euros last year while its sales actually rose from 5.41 million vehicles in 2024 to 5.48 million last year.

raw.headline: Automaker Stellantis posts massive loss, pivots from EV
raw.summary: Troubled automaker Stellantis, behind brands like Jeep and Fiat, announced Thursday a net loss of 22.3 billion euros ($26.3 billion) for last year, blaming a lack of demand for electric vehicles.Stellantis' revenue fell only by two percent to 153.5 billion euros last year while its sales actually rose from 5.41 million vehicles in 2024 to 5.48 million last year.
